Title: The Initiative
Plot: Spike, after being captured by the commandos, is being held hostage by them in a hi-tech facility underneath the University.  He manages to escape and heads to find Buffy, whom he assumes is behind this. Instead, he finds Willow...
GuestStars: Scott Becker, Mace Lombard, Marc Blucas, Mercedes McNab, Adam Kaufman, Bailey Chase, Leonard Roberts, Lindsay Crouse
